title: Barutel
description: A cluster of Roman-era limestone quarries near modern Carrières de Barutel, northwest of Nîmes in France (BAtlas 15 C2 Barutel).

properties.description: Center point of the Carrières romaines (Roman quarries) near Carrières de Barutel
properties.title: Center point of the Carrières romaines near Carrières de Barutel
